title: Jefferson National Expansion Memorial: Management
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management             Management       Learn more about how the park works from our management documents located in this section.  Federal law requires that park Superintendents maintain a written compilation of all designations, closures, permit requirements, and other restrictions imposed under discretionary authority. This compilation, known as the Superintendent's Compendium, is updated annually and be made available to the public.  Click here to go to the NPS Greenbook, information about the National Park Service budget. Click here to go to learn more about NPS management policies. Here you will find the Management Policies Book, Director's Orders, Executive Orders, Laws and Regulations. Park Planning Documents
